website_summaries.verdict: For the serious teether, this CribWrap rail set has you – and the crib – covered.
pros: Backing keeps saliva from soaking through to wood
Soft padded 100% polyester fleece crib rail covers with padded middle and waterproof backing
Comes in a variety of colors
Free of PVC, lead, phthalates, and BPA
cons: Putting these crib rails in the dryer can damage the waterproof backing, so be sure to air dry

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething kids
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found this earlier before the crib became a corn cob. 🌽 We could not find anything like this when my DD was born. She chewed on the railing like a horse chewing on a wooden post. 🙄 We used the same crib for my now teething son and I ❤️❤️❤️ these. Three covers come in the package; 2 side and one front rail cover. Very easy to put on, fits the rail and has a waterproof backing. They also are made of fleece and padded. He doesn't hit his head while pulling himself up to look out. Unless you're looking for a rustic look, buying this set will keep your crib looking nice enough to resell. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wide rail convertible
customer_reviews.text: I have a super wide convertible crib and even though it's wider than what the description Saud this will fit, it did because of the length of the ties. I actually like that the width makes the ties hang down less. I washed and line dried before using and had no issues. I love how thick and soft it is because it also acts as a cushion for a sleepy standing baby at night. Also the waterproof bottom layer is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Coulter/LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So we got this to prevent our teething toddler from wreaking havoc on our pine crib. I liked the set as I was able to get all three pieces at once and knew they would match. I did have an issue with the first set I ordered, the holes were not cut open so I had to return and repurchase. The second set was fine. I do find the ties are very thick and too short to make bows so I had to tie knots to keep them in place. Overall it will do the job but they could improve the tie and holes on them.
customer_reviews.author: Tiki

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, looks great on both cribs
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black for my son's crib, and just bought them in blue for my nephew's crib. Neither have attempted to chew on their cribs yet, but my son is teething so I have a feeling these will come in handy soon enough. Great quality, looks great on both cribs. Haven't had to wash them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof wide crib rail padding
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed, my LO is rambunctious so I had leave the original padding under this new padding. My previous padding + this gives me full confidence for self harm prevention & now waterproofed unlike my previous padding.
customer_reviews.author: Ready2shop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, nice soft material
customer_reviews.text: I haven't yet washed these rail covers so I don't know how they will hold up after but so far, they are nice. They are soft, nicely padded and attach very easily. I have a sleighbed style crib for my son and finding a rail cover that was wide enough was hard. These tie on the outside and the ties are short so I am not worried about a choking hazard. They also hold securely, I had to untie one of the straps and I had a difficult time doing it, I just used a standard single knot. Nice rich color, my son loves to run his little hands across it too, lets hope he doesn't start chewing on it!
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfEthan

customer_reviews.title: Great product a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Definitly would recommend this product. It helps protect your little ones face as well as th furniture from little ones teething and using edge of bed to nah on. Its soft for baby and all the drool does not go through because it is protected with a liner so no worry about the crib. Easy to put on and clean.
customer_reviews.author: marimor11

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, just wish I had bought one before my little one chewed up her very expensive crib. Bought a protector from buy buy baby but it only covered the front, not the sides. And it was rubber, don't really want her chewing off a piece of that. Returned it and bought this insted. Durable and soft. Easy on and off. Adjustable let to fit even the oddest shaped cribs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item and only received the 2 smaller, side rail covers and not the longer one. I’m so upset since it’s an inconvenience for me now to return this one and order a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: violeta flores

customer_reviews.title: This is so perfect in size to prevent my baby hitting his head on the crib. He is learning to roll over. He often hits his head
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect in size to prevent my baby hitting his head on the crib. He is learning to roll over. He often hits his head on the wall of crib. It’s so soft well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystalc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! Love that it comes with all 3 sides. Fits my crib rail perfectly. Will protect my baby from chewing wood and protect his crib from being ruined. It's a win win. Beautiful gray color matches his room. The material is soft and the waterproof layer under is a plus! Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Wolf

customer_reviews.title: This completely took care of the issue and is a nice pad to have around the edges for when he ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was chewing up all the wood around his bed! This completely took care of the issue and is a nice pad to have around the edges for when he decides to start jumping around inside his crib. I've purchased 3 already so we have one at each of the grandparents house as well.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thick(cushion like), well made, protects the wood and our twins teeth, has waterproof layer that protects the wood, and looks great. We had to buy extra ribbon to tie on the ties, however, our wood cribs top piece is exceptionally large. Please see picture. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Gregg1030

customer_reviews.title: No more teeth marks!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these because our then 10 month old was starting to gnaw on his crib. He's got a mouth full of teeth, and the furniture was quite pricey, so we gave these a try. The product arrived quickly and was a soft fleece material with adequate padding. Not too thin or too thick.. I didn't notice any chemical smells at all as some reviews posted. I washed them and put them on right away. They fit our bonavita metro crib perfectly and he hasn't untied the straps at all after 2 months of them being on there.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I tried to make my own rail covers using receving blankets and ties that I had on hand. My son was able to move the blankets around and get it un-done and it became a constant hassle to resituate the blankets on the rails on a daily basis. I finally broke down and got these and they work great. No more fixing the coverings everyday. They stay on and the crib rails are no longer exposed for my son to chew on. I should have gotten these a lot sooner!
customer_reviews.author: spam

customer_reviews.title: Great protector for crib paint and baby’s head from bumping too hard.
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying this reasonably priced set of rail covers for my 9 month old son’s crib. They have protected the paint of his crib as well as protected his little noggin while he’s in the stand up phase. We are pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Malone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Saves our crib from my teething daughter! The soft fleece and waterproof lining protected the wood from future bite marks. Do yourself a favor and get these before your child starts teething! Easy to tie and take off and wash, my daughter has not mastered taking them off either!
customer_reviews.author: KB2KD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My son still likes to chew on this, but at least it doesn't come apart. I machine wash it.
customer_reviews.author: gabriz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, my teething baby isn't teething on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! Awesome product, my teething baby isn't teething on the crib anymore. I did wish that you guys had other product for cribs with changers on them but I made do with it.
customer_reviews.author: HollieHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Saved my child from eating paint
customer_reviews.text: Wrap fits DaVinci Kalani crib perfectly. Glad that it protects my child from eating paint off the crib. Actually, my kid gave up on biting his crib. I give all the credit to the wrap.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tsikhan

customer_reviews.title: Great to prevent damage to crib
customer_reviews.text: Is your baby teething and chewing on things like crazy? These rail covers have been great protecting our crib rails from baby's chewing. Fits great but the ties are a little difficult to fit through the openings and we wish the front rail cover was about an inch longer because it doesn't fit our crib rail 100%.
customer_reviews.author: JoeandJeanne

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft fabric, fit as sized. Time will tell how it works against our teething baby. Why four stars, the holes to thread the ties through were way to small and some close to impossible to get the ties through.
customer_reviews.author: nbiron

customer_reviews.title: Was not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Returned them. They are nothing more than a fleece blanket that you wrap around the crib rails. You can save money and actually just make these with no sewing required. I wanted something thicker to protect baby. I wouldnt recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiana

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my little nibbler
customer_reviews.text: I put this on after my daughter went down for the night. She woke up surprised, and happy because now she could still nibble, but on something soft, and that she had something she could easily play peek-a-boo with. Great product, does the trick of protecting my daughter's beautiful new teeth, her furniture, and my heart from jumping out of my chest because I think she's swallowing wood finish. Buy it, you will both be happy :)
customer_reviews.author: teebogg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time. You don't receive all 3 pieces.
customer_reviews.text: I would give 0 stars if I could. I Ordered this the 1st time and only received the long rail cover so I double checked that it says it is a 3 piece set and it is advertised as such. So I returned it and ordered again, only for the same thing to happen. So I will be returning for my money back and ordering from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's great!
customer_reviews.text: Better for my son to chew on this than the wooden crib when he was teething. Was fun playing hide-and-seek by hiding my head behind it before he goes to bed too. Now that he's older and runs around in the crib, it turns into a bumper guard for his head. Easy to wash and dry (slightly extra drying time than my normal laundry), and still durable now after a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: dn Dave

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to wash, works well for thick bars on sides and front of crib. Easy to wash and protects our sons teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Eladar

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Needed these when my daughter started chewing on her crib. Soft fleece and waterproof back. I don't have to worry about her chewing at all anymore. My daughter plays with the ties all the time which isn't ideal. I wouldn't say that it fits our crib perfectly, but they did a pretty good job about making it universal.
customer_reviews.author: Derik Bendixsen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Terrible customer service!! I received the product and was initially impressedz super soft and has waterproof liner HOWEVER, all but two of the holes are too small for the strings and i tried to contact customer service (both the seller and amazon) and they were not helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance

customer_reviews.title: Great item to protect your crib!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 2nd child...after my oldest bit her crib when teething ans we used those stick on ones (which took off some of the cribs finish). So for our 2nd child we wanted something that would protect the crib, but remove easily! This looks pretty and is functional. Not only protects from teeth, but protects the finish from belts/buttons/zippers, when putting baby in crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny2penny

customer_reviews.title: Good for Baby
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter's little girl who is teething and chews on everything. By putting this fleece cover over the top rails in her crib she is no longer chewing on the painted finish! Worth every penny it costs! It arrived promptly, well within the alloted time frame and was well packaged. A very good product I would recommend to others. Ellen Peacock
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. Peacock

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and we're very pleased with the ease ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and we're very pleased with the ease of install and aesthetic appeal. The only thing that's a minor ding is that it'd be good if there was a way to stow the ties in the product to avoid babies pulling/fraying them over time.
customer_reviews.author: David Riley

customer_reviews.title: Must have for the crib
customer_reviews.text: These are the best crib rail protectors out there. The polar fleece stays nice even after washing and drying in the dryer. It comes with three pieces for the price (most protectors don't). My only improvement would be to have a way to cover the inside corners of the crib with an attachment piece as my little "beaver" did get through the corner of the protector and still chewed the rail.
customer_reviews.author: PoshMama

customer_reviews.title: Great crib protection
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this was sold as a three piece also the material that this is made of, fleece with a waterproof liner on the backside for drooling babies. What I did not like is that once I washed it for the first time the inside cushion, or stuffing clumped up on the longest piece. I had to stretch and spread out what I could so that it wouldn't be all gathered on one side when I put it back on the crib. Other than that my crib is protected and wish I would've bought this before the first set of teeth cut thru.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Needs more cushion
customer_reviews.text: A bit dissatisfied with my purchase. Main reason I made this purchase was to keep my daughter from banging her head, not as cushioned as I would have liked it to be. Good quality but need a whole lot more cushion. I actually had to stuff it with some quilted blankets underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Glorie

customer_reviews.title: Crib saver!
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't have this, the finish on my crib would have been completely scratched off by my little beaver son :) The is super soft and has a waterproof back to save the wood finish on the crib in case he uses the wrap as a teether as well (because he does that too)! Def worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rail cover for my daughter's crib. I was concerned it wouldn't be big enough but fit just right even bigger than expected but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Keller family.

customer_reviews.title: Great for teething babies!
customer_reviews.text: These are soft and cover the crib rails perfectly. They wash well. Highly recommend for teething babies who stand and chew on the crib rail. These look very nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: DJ76

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but cleaning them should be easier.
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and get the job done. But knowing that drooling mouths are going to be all over them you would think cleaning would be an easier process. You can machine was but they have to hang dry and who has time for that.
customer_reviews.author: Angiex57

customer_reviews.title: False product info
customer_reviews.text: When I bought it I chose it because it said three pieces, one front rail and two side rails. Product arrived today with only front rail. Way too expensive for only the front rail. I will be returning it due to false product info.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are super adorable and functional!! I would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this product. I have a wide crib and it’s difficult to find products that fit. These work great, I feel safe using them.. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I'm so glad I spent the extra money and got this set over one of the cheaper ones. These fit my crib perfectly! I was able to tie them nice and tight without any problems! My son stands up in his crib A LOT and they haven't moved at all! Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great crib wraps!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a convertible crib to protect my 10-month old from chewing on the rails. I like plastic backing to prevent drool that may soak through the fleece and onto the rails. I really appreciate that the fleece is thick enough for protection but not too thick so that my boy is able to solidly grab on the rails while he's learning to stand on his own. It's also great that the wraps are washable. Overall, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, nice decor, holds up to my destructive little boy
customer_reviews.author: KFrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: These crib rail covers are excellent! They fit my convertible crib nicely, are super soft and very well made. The covers fit the sides of the crib and back. I used a piece that I had purchased previously for the front. I am very happy with my purchase. The crib is ready for my little teether!
customer_reviews.author: JJW

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect crib rails! I had been looking for something that looks good on the crib but also serves the purpose of protecting the crib. I love the gray color and looks true to the picture as a light gray. They are soft, plush and stay well on the crib. After considering purchasing these on etsy hand made, I realized these were the best and I am very happy with my decision. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Trend Lab Crib Guard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping your baby from chewing their crib. Very thick with a plastic backing. Great quality. I would like to order a second one for my son. I recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Natasha Charles

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the wraps!
customer_reviews.text: They're perfect to keep my grandbaby from biting in the crib rails.
customer_reviews.author: ELP

customer_reviews.title: Great crib wraps!
customer_reviews.text: This 3pc rail cover set is wonderful! It looks nice, is very soft and my son seems to like feeling them (and biting them) more than the crib. lol! It came with a cute turtle rattle too, which my son loves! Easy to take off and wash. This was money worth spending!
customer_reviews.author: I Spend Too Much

customer_reviews.title: Great crib wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I love these crib wraps. They are super soft and cover all possible areas where baby can chew. They are much prettier than those plastic crib guards.
customer_reviews.author: Suzio

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's soft, the actual color it was online, it fits our 3 in 1 crib perfectly. Easy to install and it does actually protect the crib well. Haven't had to wash it yet but it is really sturdy, so I don't think that will be a problem. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheesecake6006

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Such nice quality. Fits perfectly. Would recommend to anyone who has a “biter”
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My crib has a wide front where I’m unable to tie a bumper to the front panel...this works great for the width that my crib has. The gray looks great with our crib set also! Washing and drying was no issue, I was worried about it wrinkling super bad, but has not been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: I had some rubber teething guards for my daughters' crib, but they did not fit my sons crib. I found this product and it was the perfect solution. It should work on any size/style because of the wrap over design. I love it, and it has put an end to the bite marks in my sons beautiful crib. I only wish I had ordered it sooner! I also like that it is washable, so I can ensure that the drool stains are washed away frequently!!
customer_reviews.author: Momto4

customer_reviews.title: Save your Crib!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter started chewing on the side of her crib at about 12 months ... These saved the crib and are incredibly soft and well put together! A little expensive, but we are glad we purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: AF Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I only recieved one piece. Not 3 pieces like I paid for. Thankfully Amazon customer service helped me out. However still an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Allannah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, washs well, and saves the crib. 5 stars all day!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: My Wife found this and it works great! My wonderfull 11 month old is in the ...
customer_reviews.text: My Wife found this and it works great! My wonderfull 11 month old is in the biting stage and this is helping keep our investment in a nice bed/ crib (without bite marks)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan j Danek

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: This has saved my daughters crib. I looked everywhere, I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Avalon's first bite
customer_reviews.text: The fleece crib protector has been a God send. No longer do I have to wake with the fear that my daughter will have wood chips in her mouth from teething on her crib rail. Easy to tie on, easy to wash and easy on the eye. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Lomas ticas

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and stays firmly in place
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want my baby chewing the top of the crib so I bought this crib wrap. I'm very happy with my purchase. It's very soft and thick. Also, the ties stay in place even as my baby pulls up using the crib wrap and even though I didn't make a full knot on the strings.
customer_reviews.author: Eszterhazy

customer_reviews.title: If you have a nice crib, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: My baby started using her changing table as a teether and was ruining the wood, so we bought these for the crib. They work nice, and they are also a nice buffer for babies who are learning to pull themselves up, but are still a little clumsy!
customer_reviews.author: Abcampbell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was teething on the rails of her crib and this has stopped it! Its a nice beige color which matches anything and its easily installed and washable as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Ty, ty!
customer_reviews.text: This is sooooo awesome! Very thick, extremely soft, and very much so waterproof! A little crib is left exposed, from each piece, but luckily I covered the spots with fabric. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: kiwibreeze69

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I wish this came with all 4 sides as my daughter chews her whole crib! It works well though, she hasn't been able to chew the covered parts at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the second set of teething guards I bought after the first (different brand) just wasn't up to par. I absolutely love it! The color is perfect, the material outside is soft and cushy, and underneath is a durable material that almost grips the crib so it stays in place. I love that it ties into place and it doesn't move up or down on the crib. Absolutely recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Greenwalt

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These covers are wonderful! They do exactly what they're meant to do, and they look very attractive doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent (but a little stinky at first).
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Works great. A little stinky out of the package but it aired out (washing it didn't help with the odor). Keeps my little guy from ruining his crib rail.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Nicey made
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well made and hoping these keep the baby from teething on the expensive wooden crib.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job, not the easiest to tie up but it served its purpose. Better than having an infant chewing wood and paint chips off the side of the crib...
customer_reviews.author: S. Martins

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fit great. The ties could be just a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fit great. The ties could be just a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old daughter started chewing on her crib rails, so I needed something to protect them. I LOVE these! I have a convertible crib and these protectors fit it perfectly. They are so soft and they even match her bedding!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter started chewing on her too expensive wooden crib & this protected it from any further damage. Very thick material & machine washable. I bought the dark brown to be more neutral against the espresso wood. I have reccommended this to other parents with teething babies.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Johns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO PUT ON AND DID THE JOB FOR ME
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right fit!
customer_reviews.text: Our crib has sculpted rails so they are not flat. These covers were perfect since they allow for flexibility of crib design. I'm not concerned about them coming off since they tie on. The type of material allows for secure knots and though my daughter plays with the strings they remain unimpacted. It has been a great product and still looks great 2 mths later.
customer_reviews.author: MomWife&Therapist

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and wash well
customer_reviews.text: Crib savior! No more teeth marks or worrying about the kid eating paint. Very cute, easy to install and wash well!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. if you need extra padding, put some towels or foam under these.
customer_reviews.author: Becky G.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: These crib rail covers are great. They are soft and thick, and a great value compared to the other covers that are available. I tied the strings in bows on the outside so my kids couldn't pull on them, and it looks a little neater too.
customer_reviews.author: Busy momma

customer_reviews.title: Crib Wraps are the best brand
customer_reviews.text: Crib Wraps are the best. I wouldn't go with any other brand. They don't fit well or don't tie good.Love my Crib Wraps
customer_reviews.author: Chrystina Silvia

customer_reviews.title: why did I not think of this!
customer_reviews.text: Dang wish I would have found these sooner! Look great and protect crib and baby.
customer_reviews.author: Happy momma

customer_reviews.title: Love these rail covers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these rail covers! I bought them after my daughter destroyed her crib when teething. I was worried about them being fleece but they look so great! I got the brown set since her crib is dark brown wood. My only regret is not buying them sooner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will recommend
customer_reviews.text: 3 years plus in use for my 3 kids and still holding strong, good wash.
customer_reviews.author: dairyman2000

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: It's a little pricey for what you get, but I love this product. I wish I would've have bought this sooner to prevent bite marks on the crib.
customer_reviews.author: KYT

customer_reviews.title: covers
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product.Great product to protect your crib rails and add a little padding for the baby. Looks nice and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: MCRjr

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with rail covers!
customer_reviews.text: These by far surpassed my expectations... They're soft fleece with a water proof backing. Color matches the bedding perfectly! Easy to put on, and will fit wide rails (though mine aren't). They don't cover the corners, but pretty close to them. Right now I'm using them as scratch protectors for my crib, as the wood scratches easily and I'm worried about leaning over them. But I have no doubts these will perform as intended when my little one grows fangs.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Barrington

customer_reviews.title: Cushions little heads from hard bumps
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandaughter. Didn't want her to bump her head on her wooden railings when she was learning to stand. These wraps cushioned her head from the hard bump. They tend to slide down slightly on the end rails.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is super soft, and I love the ties instead of velcro. Good quality and they came out of the wash fine. Would recommend to prevent your baby from knawing on wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mytakeonit

customer_reviews.title: worked great
customer_reviews.text: protected my son's crib rails from his little teeth while he's teething. easy to install, attractive looking and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kulupka

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this! It's a super soft fleece type fabric
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! It's a super soft fleece type fabric. Easy to wash and attach to crib. Sooo glad I made this purchase, it has saved our over $300 crib from bite marks and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: seth crum

customer_reviews.title: So necessary
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I wish I had bought BEFORE daughter chewed the crib rails. Good quality. Waterproof backing (ie drool proof). Washable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: EcoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Crib rail cover
customer_reviews.text: Covered rails on crib so baby can't scar the wood by chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Banks

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The cribwrap works great. It's got a little bit of padding, which is good for when the baby bites down on the edge of the crib. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SDmom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover. Durable and soft. Fit the convertible crib perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: My little girl was starting to gnaw on her crib - no good! These are a perfect solution - soft, easy to attach and no fear that my baby girl can undo them and harm herself in any way. Highly recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works perfectly. I've had no problem with any of the pieces. There is a very slight colour mismatch between the 1-pc long cover and the 2-pc short covers, but only the pickiest people would ever notice when it's in use. I did notice a plastic odour as other reviewers have noted, but this disappeared by the time the product had finished air-drying before first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kinsman

customer_reviews.title: Fits well on convertible cribs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our convertible crib. The 3 pieces fit very well with room to spare over the wider rails. The fleece is soft and the light blue color is as expected. I especially like that the ties are long - the bumper ties were too short, and I was always struggling to tie and retie to change sheets. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Price Family

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These have worked so well for my son. He no longer chews the rails! They fit perfect and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: CribWrap
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the convertable cribs. I bought a second set so both daughters' cribs will have these. The material is very soft too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product does the job of preventing my daughter from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product does the job of preventing my daughter from destroying the wood on the crib with her bite marks!
customer_reviews.author: PG

product_meta.title: CribWrap Crib Wrap 3PC Rail Cover Set By Trend Lab - 1- 51" Front Rail Cover and 2- 27" Side Rail Covers, Natural Fleece
product_meta.description: Color:NaturalProtect your baby and protect your crib! The 3 Piece CribWrap Convertible Crib Rail Cover Set by Trend Lab is the perfect solution for protecting your crib and teething baby. With Natural super soft Sherpa fleece on the top, a light padding in the middle and a waterproof backing, you no longer have to worry about your baby ingesting wood or harmful toxins while also preserving your crib investment for use in years to come. Just wrap and tie on this simple solution. Set includes 1 Front rail cover measures 51” long and 2 Side rail covers each measures 27” long and have 3 sets of 6.5” ties. Machine washable in super soft Sherpa fleece. Trend Lab Natural Fleece CribWrap Convertible Crib Rail Cover-27 Item # 109055. Trend Lab Natural Fleece CribWrap Convertible Crib Rail Cover-51” Item # 109082.
feature_bullets: Natural Fleece 3 Piece CribWrap Convertible Crib Rail Cover Set
Set includes 1 Front rail cover measures 51” long and has 3 sets of 6.5” ties
2 Side rail covers each measures 27” long and has 3 sets of 6.5” ties
Lightly padded waterproofing layer protects the wood surface from potential moisture
Easy to remove and completely Machine Washable.
